results.name: E.g.f. satisfies: A'(x) = 1/(1 + x*A(x)) with A(0) = 1.
comment: Define a polynomial sequence P_n(x) recursively by
It appears that a(n+1) = P_n(1) (checked as far as a(19)).
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..190
formula: E.g.f. satisfies: A(x) = 1 + Integral 1/(1 + x*A(x)) dx.
E.g.f. satisfies: A(G(x)) = 1 + x where G(x) is the e.g.f. of A000932 (offset 1). [_Paul D. Hanna_, Aug 23 2011]
